name: teable
description: Teable is an open-source, self-hosted Airtable alternative with relational tables, views, and collaboration features. It provides forms, filters, and integrations through a modern web UI and REST API, with optional managed hosting.
features: Relational tables: Create interconnected tables with relationships, lookups, and rollups for complex data modeling.
Multiple views: Display data in grid, kanban, gallery, calendar, or form views to match different workflows.
Collaboration: Work together in real-time with team members on shared bases with granular permission controls.
Forms: Generate public or private forms from tables to collect data from users without database access.
Filtering and sorting: Apply complex filters and multi-level sorting to focus on relevant data subsets.
REST API: Access and manipulate data programmatically through a comprehensive REST API for integrations.
Field types: Use rich field types including text, numbers, dates, attachments, checkboxes, and formulas.
Formulas: Calculate values dynamically using spreadsheet-like formulas with functions and field references.
Automation: Trigger actions automatically based on data changes or schedules for workflow automation.
Import and export: Import data from CSV, Excel, or other sources and export in multiple formats.
Templates: Start quickly with pre-built templates for common use cases like project management or CRM.
Self-hosted or cloud: Choose between self-hosting for full control or managed cloud hosting for convenience.
